alert.note: Alert for Lenawee; Monroe (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 10:51AM EDT until April 01 at 11:30AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Monroe County in southeastern Michigan... Eastern Lenawee County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 1130 AM EDT. * At 1051 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blissfield, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Blissfield around 1055 AM EDT. Deerfield around 1100 AM EDT. Petersburg and Britton around 1105 AM EDT. Dundee and Ida around 1110 AM EDT. Maybee around 1120 AM EDT. Carleton around 1125 AM EDT. Flat Rock around 1130 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Newport, Cone, Estral Beach, Ogden Center, South Rockwood, Woodland Beach, Stony Point, Ridgeway, Palmyra and Sand Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
